discussion.author: amahboubi
discussion.comment: @thery @pi8027 Is this PR ready for merging? From the outside it seems so.

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
How about this proof?:
```coq
move=> ?; apply: big_morph=> [? ?|]; [exact: Euclid_dvdM | exact: Euclid_dvd1].
```
I think reformulating `Euclid_dvdM` with the `{morph ...}` notation might be better.
